languages.text: "Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость. Это было кощунством — оскорблять ваш слух такими недопустимыми речами".

traits.locale_text: "Прошу простить, Ваше благородие. Это было кощунством — оскорблять ваш слух такими недопустимыми речами".

languages.text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."
languages.original_text: "Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость. Это было кощунством — оскорблять ваш слух такими недопустимыми речами".

traits.locale_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."
"I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."
"I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."
"I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."
"I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."

languages.text: 「どうかご容赦を、陛下。そのようなひどい言葉で君の耳を汚すのは度が過ぎていた」
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."

traits.locale_text: 「どうかご容赦を、陛下。そのようなひどい言葉で君の耳を汚すのは度が過ぎていた」

languages.text: “我恳求您的原谅，大人。我说了那些无礼的话，冒犯了您的耳朵，这实在是太失礼了。”
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."

traits.locale_text: “我恳求您的原谅，大人。我说了那些无礼的话，冒犯了您的耳朵，这实在是太失礼了。”

languages.text: «Le ruego que me disculpe, {mf|milord|milady}. Fue una impertinencia por mi parte ofender sus oídos con palabras tan espantosas».
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."

traits.locale_text: «Le ruego que me disculpe, {mf|milord|milady}. Fue una impertinencia por mi parte ofender sus oídos con palabras tan espantosas».

languages.text: « Je vous présente mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. Je n'aurais jamais dû avoir l'outrecuidance d'offenser vos oreilles avec des propos pareils. »
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous présente mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. Je n'aurais jamais dû avoir l'outrecuidance d'offenser vos oreilles avec des propos pareils. »

languages.text: "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es war impertinent von mir, Eure Ohren mit derart abstoßenden Worten zu beleidigen."
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es war impertinent von mir, Eure Ohren mit derart abstoßenden Worten zu beleidigen."

languages.text: "Özür dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kulaklarınızı böylesi korkunç sözlerle doldurmam hadsizceydi."
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was impertinent of me to offend your ears with such appalling words."

traits.locale_text: "Özür dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kulaklarınızı böylesi korkunç sözlerle doldurmam küstahçaydı."
